alert.note: Alert for Northern Virginia Blue Ridge (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 05 at 7:05PM EST until December 06 at 8:00AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches, with the highest amounts for elevations above 2500 feet. * WHERE...Northern Virginia Blue Ridge Mountains including Shenandoah National Park. * WHEN...Until 8 AM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. When venturing outside, watch your first few steps taken on steps, sidewalks, and driveways, which could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.
